title: The Expanse authors Daniel Abraham and Ty Franck (Part 2: Spoilers!)
description:
Sign up for CuriosityStream and Nebula for $15/year: https://curiositystream.com/asxpod

This episode has spoilers for The Expanse books up to Tiamat's Wrath.

Part 1 of the interview: https://art19.com/shows/alt-shift-x-podcast/episodes/a4cb240b-cbe4-4c34-819e-1cac4a5701c4

0:00 Intro

0:57 Cosmic horror in Leviathan Falls

1:40 Aliens, mystery

6:13 Surveillance in Persepolis Rising

9:00 Worldbuilding

15:10 History

17:42 Politics

23:48 30 year gap, George R. R. Martin

29:54 Returning characters

34:05 Heroism & work

38:00 Expanse genres

40:36 Amos and Holden in Tiamat's Wrath

51:10 Names

54:00 Clarissa in Persepolis Rising

59:34 Aging, Naomi in Tiamat's Wrath

YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=828bLzoapec

Alt Shift X Expanse videos: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLn6yDpEottdiQe66hGsUa8o4CIDjCanyW

Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/show/77vubQGd6CsuespWT2Wqa0

Apple Podcasts: https://podcasts.apple.com/podcast/alt-shift-podcast/id1467112355

Google Podcasts: https://podcasts.google.com/?feed=aHR0cHM6Ly9hbmNob3IuZm0vcy9iNGRlNjQ4L3BvZGNhc3QvcnNz

Twitter: https://twitter.com/AltShiftX

Special thanks to Patrons Cameron Weiss, Michael Appell, Ryan Steele, Triangle Wine Company, Harry, Shane Veglia, Brian Sentient, Ria McDoodle, Tim Cunniff, NotGac, Cara Akame, Ilhuilkamina Urdiana, SirRusty.
